title: may 18: welcome to my swamp (with Michael Brun)
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the premiere of Shrek. After, she remembers “Don’t You (Forget About Me)” by Simple Minds. She is also joined by special guest Michael Brun who reminds us of this important day in Haiti history: Haitian Flag Day. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
